trans-unit.source: Provides a graphics buffer for double buffering.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um buffer de gráficos para buffer duplo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> class allows you to implement custom double buffering for your graphics.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> classe permite que você implemente o buffer duplo personalizado para seus elementos gráficos.

trans-unit.source: It provides a wrapper for a graphics buffer, along with methods that you can use to write to the buffer and render its contents to an output device.
trans-unit.target: Ele fornece um wrapper para um buffer de gráficos, junto com os métodos que você pode usar para gravar no buffer e processar seu conteúdo para um dispositivo de saída.

trans-unit.source: Graphics that use double buffering can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by redrawing a display surface.
trans-unit.target: Elementos gráficos que usam o buffer duplo podem reduzir ou eliminar a cintilação causado redesenhando uma superfície de exibição.

trans-unit.source: When you use double buffering, updated graphics are first drawn to a buffer in memory, and the contents of this buffer are then quickly written to some or all of the displayed surface.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usa o buffer duplo, gráfico atualizado é desenhado primeiro em um buffer na memória e o conteúdo desse buffer rapidamente, em seguida, é gravado para alguns ou todos da superfície exibida.

trans-unit.source: This relatively brief overwrite of the displayed graphics typically reduces or eliminates the flicker that sometimes occurs when graphics are updated.
trans-unit.target: Essa substituição relativamente breve dos gráficos exibidos normalmente reduz ou elimina a cintilação que às vezes acontece quando os gráficos são atualizados.

trans-unit.source: The simplest way to use double buffering is to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer> control style flag on a control using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A maneira mais simples de usar buffer duplo é definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer> controlar o sinalizador de estilo em um controle usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer> flag for a control redirects all painting for the control through a default graphics buffer, without requiring any additional code.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer> sinalizador para um controle redireciona toda a pintura para o controle por meio de um buffer de gráfico padrão, sem a necessidade de qualquer código adicional.

trans-unit.source: This flag is set to `true` by default.
trans-unit.target: Este sinalizador é definido como `true` por padrão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> class has no public constructor and must be created by the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for an application domain using its <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> classe não tem construtor público e deve ser criada pelo <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> para um domínio de aplicativo usando sua <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the current application domain from the static <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode recuperar o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> para o domínio de aplicativo atual de estático <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Graphics%2A> property can be used for drawing to the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Graphics%2A> propriedade pode ser usada para desenhar o buffer de gráficos.

trans-unit.source: This property provides access to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that draws to the graphics buffer allocated for this <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade fornece acesso para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> que leva para o buffer de gráficos alocado para este objeto <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A> method with no arguments draws the contents of the graphics buffer to the surface specified when the buffer was allocated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A> método com desenhos sem argumentos buffer o conteúdo dos elementos gráficos à superfície de especificado quando o buffer alocado.

trans-unit.source: Other overloads of the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A> method allow you to specify a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object or an <xref:System.IntPtr> object that points to a device context to which to draw the contents of the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: Outras sobrecargas do <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A> método permitem que você especifique um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto ou uma <xref:System.IntPtr> objeto que aponta para um contexto de dispositivo para o qual desenhar o conteúdo do buffer de gráficos.

trans-unit.source: For more information about drawing double-buffered graphics, see [Double Buffered Graphics](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/double-buffered-graphics.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o desenho de elementos gráficos em buffer duplo, consulte [gráficos em buffer duplo](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/double-buffered-graphics.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using a <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object to draw graphics using several types of buffering implementations.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar um <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> objeto ao desenhar gráficos usando vários tipos de implementações de buffer.

trans-unit.source: Clicking the form alternately starts and stops a timer that causes draw updates.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa clicando no formulário inicia e interrompe um temporizador que faz com que desenha atualizações.

trans-unit.source: The draw updates allow you to observe the effect of double buffering.
trans-unit.target: As atualizações de desenho permitem que você observar o efeito de buffer duplo.

trans-unit.source: Right-clicking the form cycles through the following drawing modes:
trans-unit.target: Clicando duas vezes os ciclos de formulário por meio de modos de desenho a seguir:

trans-unit.source: Drawing directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Desenhando diretamente para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A> para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: Drawing by overriding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> method using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer> control style.
trans-unit.target: Desenhando, substituindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> usando o método de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer> estilo de controle.

trans-unit.source: Drawing by overriding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> method for the form method without using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer> control style.
trans-unit.target: Desenhando, substituindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnPaint%2A> método para o método de formulário sem usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer> estilo de controle.

trans-unit.source: In each mode, text is drawn that identifies the current mode and describes the behavior that occurs when each mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Em cada modo, o texto é desenhado que identifica o modo atual e descreve o comportamento que ocorre quando cada botão do mouse é pressionado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics" /> class is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics" /> não é segura para threads.

trans-unit.source: When accessing a graphics buffer from separate threads, it is important to use a thread-access control mechanism to prevent conflicts.
trans-unit.target: Ao acessar um buffer de gráficos de threads separados, é importante usar um mecanismo de controle de acesso de thread para evitar conflitos.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics" />.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Dispose%2A> quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Dispose%2A> método deixa o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> objeto em um estado inutilizável.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Dispose%2A>, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> do objeto para o coletor de lixo possa recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> objeto estava ocupando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Sempre chamar <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Dispose%2A> antes de liberar sua última referência para o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chame o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> do objeto `Finalize` método.

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Permite que um objeto tente liberar recursos e executar outras operações de limpeza antes de ser recuperado pela coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object that outputs to the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> que gera saídas para o buffer de gráficos.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object that outputs to the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> objeto saídas para o buffer de gráficos.

trans-unit.source: This property provides a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that draws to the graphics buffer allocated for this <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade fornece uma <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> que leva para o buffer de gráficos alocado para este objeto <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: Grava o conteúdo do buffer de gráficos.

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the default device.
trans-unit.target: Grava o conteúdo do buffer de gráficos no dispositivo padrão.

trans-unit.source: This method writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the device specified by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> used to create this <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Esse método grava o conteúdo do buffer de gráfico para o dispositivo especificado chamando o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> método o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> usadas para criar este <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object to which to write the contents of the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> no qual gravar o conteúdo do buffer gráfico.

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Grava o conteúdo do buffer gráfico no objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the specified <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Esse método grava o conteúdo do buffer de gráfico especificado <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates rendering the contents of the graphics buffer to a specified <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a renderizar o conteúdo do buffer de gráficos para determinado <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Esse código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> classe.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> that points to the device context to which to write the contents of the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> que aponta para o contexto de dispositivo no qual gravar o conteúdo do buffer de gráficos.

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the device context associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> handle.
trans-unit.target: Grava o conteúdo do buffer de gráficos no contexto de dispositivo associado ao identificador <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the device context associated with the specified <xref:System.IntPtr> handle.
trans-unit.target: Esse método grava o conteúdo do buffer de gráfico para o contexto de dispositivo associado especificado <xref:System.IntPtr> tratar.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to render the contents of the graphics buffer `grafx` to a specified device context.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como renderizar o conteúdo do buffer de gráficos `grafx` em um contexto de dispositivo especificado.

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Esse código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> classe.

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: para acessar código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumeração de relacionados: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
